class_notes:
This is a 2-part course. In part 1 students complete online didactic course content asynchronously (available in December). In part 2 students will self-register for one synchronous workshop taking place in the February.  
February 10  6-8:30pm
February 12  6-8:30pm
February 13  9:30-12:00pm
February 17  6-8:30pm
February 19  6-8:30pm
course_description: This course will introduce public health students to concepts of leadership including various leadership styles; emotional intelligence; collaboration; principles of project management including budgets, human resources, conflict, negotiation and mediation. Lastly, the course will introduce key aspects of audience-appropriate communication and will discuss communication frameworks specific to public health communication.
sections: Class Nbr: 4902, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: D. Lang, Status: Open
